altTitles.ja: ひだまりスケッチアンソロジーコミック

description.en:
An anthology comic of Hidamari Sketch by various mangaka.

---
**Volume 1**
Cover: [MATSUDA98](https://mangadex.org/author/49e0381e-7328-4f0d-af4c-ceb21e56022b)
Back cover: Koshou Shichimi
Cover 4-koma & manga: [Nakama Asaki](https://mangadex.org/author/2c08ab93-526a-4beb-b0e6-b2427dab2c19)
Title page/ToC illustration: [Nonohara Chiki](https://mangadex.org/author/b6dba42a-7b81-4118-8c12-205625b36c99)
Color illustrations: Cloth Tsugutoshi, [Arai Cherry](https://mangadex.org/author/1e369209-2934-45e4-a02a-47812ecf08ab), Koshou Shichimi, [Banno Negi](https://mangadex.org/author/dec86f03-45d7-4e40-8497-dbf4118bd6fa), [Tanaka Shoutarou](https://mangadex.org/author/f6e621c9-1530-4e83-987f-359d3ecb593e), [Sato Yoshimi](https://mangadex.org/author/3b4ef34b-cd49-401a-9c13-de74d277d947)

**Chapters**:
1. **Let's Have a Picnic!** by Shuu Kazuki
2. **Hidamari Mermaid** by Sanada Ikki
3. **Idamari Croquis** by Sato Yoshimi
4. **Miya-chan's Magic Brush** by Watanabe Sumiko
5. **The Place Where Sun Shines** by MATSUDA98
6. **Hirahira Skirt (Flipping Skirts)** by Oniyazu Kakashi
7. **Jokes & Hidamari** by MOOK
8. **Hidamari Yunocchi** by Munekichi
9. **Downpour Sketch** Hakamada Mera
10. **At the End of the Rainbow.** by Kuchihacchou Gurigura
11. **If We Met in a Dream** by kashmir
---
**Volume 2**
Cover: Koshou Shichimi
Back cover: [Oniyazu Kakashi](https://mangadex.org/author/5e690bf3-a0cd-4060-8445-fabf0a050992)
Cover 4-koma & manga: [Sato Yoshimi](https://mangadex.org/author/3b4ef34b-cd49-401a-9c13-de74d277d947)
Title page/ToC illustration: [Komusou](https://mangadex.org/author/f2c6ed8a-95f9-4ee6-a25f-1d3c0bd0216d)
Color illustrations: [MATSUDA98](https://mangadex.org/author/49e0381e-7328-4f0d-af4c-ceb21e56022b), [Shuu Kazuki](https://mangadex.org/author/53d3b8eb-af14-466a-82be-2634c3077eb7), Aboshi Mako, Tsuji Touko, [Kuwahara Hihihi](https://mangadex.org/author/c605bfb2-30dd-4509-b755-d980a2c5b75b), Sorahana Koyori

**Chapters**:
1. **Sketch of A Certain Morning** by Sato Yoshimi
2. **Hotehote Sketch** by Shiwasu Touko
3. **Yunocchi in Wonderland** by Kadose Ara
4. **Okosama Sketch** by Nonohara Chiki
5. **Kneady Clay** by Shirayuki Shion
6. **The Thing You're Looking For Is Found In A Dream** by NAGIAN
7. **Karaburi Snatch** by Kobayashi Tetsuya
8. **Komawari Sketch** by MOOK
9. **Nakama's Hidamari Sketch** by Nakama Asaki
10. **Yoshinoya-sensei; Extra-large, with Extra Sauce** by Oniyazu Kakashi
11. **Round and Round and Round** by Iwami Shouko
12. **The Melancholy of Eyeglasses** by Sakura Tasuke
---
**Volume 3**
Covers: Asami
Cover 4-koma: [Bakutendou](https://mangadex.org/author/3c3ba916-8f3c-41e4-8a11-8d0b7a18b726)
Inside cover illustration: [Mikami Komata](https://mangadex.org/author/e5eba1b3-5d2c-476f-9bab-44b2d0892065)
Title page/ToC illustration: [Sakaki](https://mangadex.org/author/bba6f145-48ad-4fd1-93aa-9a842c429f82)
Color illustrations: [Shiba Yuusuke](https://mangadex.org/author/312b9dee-706a-4e93-a5ba-27ec8e6e9aad), [Nonohara Chiki](https://mangadex.org/author/b6dba42a-7b81-4118-8c12-205625b36c99), [Kakifly](https://mangadex.org/author/554bbd25-b132-4e18-9c7c-5055a2a8c6db), [Munekichi](https://mangadex.org/author/c02fba1e-4222-4d90-990c-badbfe9e23bc), [Haruna Mao](https://mangadex.org/author/6f950ee7-a894-40d3-9254-1359eb5edd89), [Kanikama](https://mangadex.org/author/ce6d0c08-c364-425c-a23f-ca1090870501)

**Chapters**:
1. **Today's Meal x365** by Suzushiro Seri
2. **A Day in Hidamari Apartments** by Sato Yoshimi
3. **Yuno-sama of the Future** by Mikami Komata
4. **Cookie Effect** by Kaneko Masaru
5. **Hiro-san & Yuno** by Kazama Ayami
6. **Little Witch Magical Yoshinon** by Kobayashi Tetsuya
7. **Yoshinoya Style Cosplay Sketch** by Purapa
8. **Nuku Nuku Hidamare!** by Monchii
9. **Hidamari Sea Story** by Komusou
10. **The Source of Her Energy is...** by Yamabuki Aya
11. **When You Are in a Holem Stop Skeching** by Tozakura Nagomi
12. **Does Hidamari Apartments Share The Dream For A Handkerchief?** by Araki Fuu
---
**Volume 4**
Cover: [Murata Taichi](https://mangadex.org/author/b3c0f259-6277-4a11-9bc0-cf059540969f)
Back cover: [Marimo](https://mangadex.org/author/f89c8878-5145-45e6-bfc8-88019be6e469)
Cover 4-koma: [Tozakura Nagomi](https://mangadex.org/author/00838bd5-9c50-4eaf-87ed-f68b8c766168)
Inside cover manga: [Daioki](https://mangadex.org/author/222a8fc4-d45d-41dc-b448-0568a83a014e)
Title page/ToC illustration: [Yuni](https://mangadex.org/author/882f4480-96c0-4ec5-aeac-82b8169a5b9d)
Color illustrations: [Kotamaru](https://mangadex.org/author/dd015357-05d2-42bb-bd8a-c5fe09334bff), [ms](https://mangadex.org/author/2d57adfc-12c8-455c-969c-b2029798a520), [Hashimoto Shin](https://mangadex.org/author/4661f9f8-fc27-4ade-8a26-86e3bbad5262), CHANxCO, 4224, [Futami Sui](https://mangadex.org/author/66e1f791-4553-4c8b-9bec-2329e73ba4db)

**Chapters**:
1. **Silent Sketch** by Shiba Yuusuke
2. **Hidamari Now** by Hoppege
3. **Blue Sky Sketch** by Hamayumiba Sou
4. **Dream-Colored Sketch** by Dasoku Sentarou
5. **Lotus** by Harukaze Mika
6. **Rain and Dandelion** by Nannyaka
7. **A Day in Hidamari Apartments** by rin
8. **Hidamari Princess Weather** by Takatou None
9. **Bargain Sketch** by Risa Risa
10. **Present** by Marimo
11. **Guests in Pajamas** by Unohana Tsukasa
12. **Sunshine and Cherry Blossoms** by Murata Taichi
---
**Volume 5**
Cover: [Tiv](https://mangadex.org/author/1a79d104-f272-466b-a222-5e754e767230)
Back cover: [Mayuge](https://mangadex.org/author/4818dcd1-8de4-4015-8b68-618b52bfe637)
Cover 4-koma: [Suka](https://mangadex.org/author/ccfaa1ce-767a-4fbf-b9a5-3baf91a787e5)
Inside cover manga: [Hota.](https://mangadex.org/author/034b9d81-4114-4e45-bb52-08722ad49a5e)
Title page/ToC illustration: [Mikage](https://mangadex.org/author/f1eb0544-19fb-40e3-981b-07da4bf83b92)
Color illustrations: [Igarashi Aguri](https://mangadex.org/author/2849553b-5337-4e54-8811-9acc8b34cd85), [Hanabana Tsubomi](https://mangadex.org/author/4de03cce-82aa-4ba2-896a-5856813a0df8), [Tooyama Ema](https://mangadex.org/author/d89a5a2b-bf29-4dd5-a1c3-412bf45300fc), Miyoshino, [Hota.](https://mangadex.org/author/034b9d81-4114-4e45-bb52-08722ad49a5e), [Iwaoka Hisae](https://mangadex.org/author/b6c147eb-d086-4a25-a0e7-86ba670e021f)

**Chapters**:
1. **Library** by Rui Tamachi
2. **Hidamari Anniversary** by Chama
3. **Miya-chan is a Genius** by Mayuge
4. **Memory Sketch** by Take Shinobu
5. **Miyaworld** by Kuwashima Rein
6. **Hidamari Laundry** by Shima Tokio
7. **Okonomi Sketch** by Tozakura Nagomi
8. **Hidamari Food** by Inoue Kaku
9. **Animal Sketch** by Morina Nao
10. **Hidamari Recipe** by Amatou
11. **Autumn Sketch** by Tachitsu Teto
12. **Bishonure Sketch** by Nagami Yuu
13. **Hidamari Holiday** by Hami
14. **Hidamari Et Cetera** by Sakaki
